subproject.corporate outcome: National and sub-national level governance expand its capacities in addressing human security risks, and delivery of equitable public service with due consideration of the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups by grounding their standards of practice in the principles of human rights and good governance.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Southern Thailand Empowerment
